name: @ecomplus/storefront-cms
description: Content and page builder for Storefront based on Netlify CMS

scripts.build: cd netlify-cms* && yarn build && npx ncp packages/netlify-cms-app/dist ../dist && cd ..
scripts.release: npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m "chore(release): dist" && npm run version
